official-title.#text:
To amend title IV of the Employee Retirement Income
		  Security Act of 1974 to provide for a guarantee by the Pension Benefit Guaranty
		  Corporation for qualified preretirement survivor annuities under insolvent or
		  terminated multiemployer pension plans.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Education and the
			 Workforce

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Guarantee for pre-retirement
			 survivor annuities under multiemployer pension plans

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is
			 amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 4022A(b) of
			 the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974/s:4022A/ss:b

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, a
				qualified preretirement survivor annuity (as defined in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974/s:4022A/ss:a
Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974/s:205/ss:e/p:1
Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974/s:4245/ss:b

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
or is terminated shall not be treated as
				forfeitable solely because the participant has not died as of the date on which
				the plan became so insolvent or the termination
				date.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974/s:4281/ss:d/p:2

text.#text:
The amendment made by this section shall apply with
			 respect to multiemployer plan benefit payments becoming payable on or after
			 December 31, 1984.
